officialTitle: Does Saline Injection Around Phrenic Nerve Reduce Incidence of Diaphragmatic Paresis Following Interscalene Block?
inclusionCriteria:
* Patients undergoing surgery on shoulder, humerus, or clavicle
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
* Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Patient refusal
* Allergy to local anaesthesia
* Severe coagulopathy
* Contralateral phrenic nerve palsy
* Local infection
* Moderate to severe pulmonary dysfunction (GOLD II, II, IV)
